--- title: Week 04 Lab Lab Notes -- Sample 'PostgreSQL' questions Queries for Joining Tables author: Owen date: 2024-05-24 date-format: "dddd MMM D, YYYY" format: html: toc: true toc-depth: 5 toc-location: left number-sections: true number-depth: 5 --- 1. List all flights that were delayed more than 30 minutes on departure. ::: {.cell} ```{.sql .cell-code} SELECT * FROM flights WHERE dep_delay > 30; ```
Table: Displaying records 1 - 10 | year| month| day| dep_time| sched_dep_time| dep_delay| arr_time| sched_arr_time| arr_delay|carrier | flight|tailnum |origin |dest | air_time| distance| hour| minute|time_hour | |----:|-----:|---:|--------:|--------------:|---------:|--------:|--------------:|---------:|:-------|------:|:-------|:------|:----|--------:|--------:|----:|------:|:-------------------| | 2013| 1| 1| 732| 645| 47| 1011| 941| 30|UA | 1111|N37456 |EWR |MCO | 145| 937| 6| 45|2013-01-01 11:00:00 | | 2013| 1| 1| 957| 733| 144| 1056| 853| 123|UA | 856|N534UA |EWR |BOS | 37| 200| 7| 33|2013-01-01 12:00:00 | | 2013| 1| 1| 1025| 951| 34| 1258| 1302| -4|UA | 501|N437UA |EWR |MCO | 137| 937| 9| 51|2013-01-01 14:00:00 | | 2013| 1| 1| 1114| 900| 134| 1447| 1222| 145|UA | 1086|N76502 |LGA |IAH | 248| 1416| 9| 0|2013-01-01 14:00:00 | | 2013| 1| 1| 1120| 944| 96| 1331| 1213| 78|EV | 4495|N16561 |EWR |SAV | 117| 708| 9| 44|2013-01-01 14:00:00 | | 2013| 1| 1| 1253| 1212| 41| 1524| 1436| 48|UA | 754|N576UA |EWR |DEN | 252| 1605| 12| 12|2013-01-01 17:00:00 | | 2013| 1| 1| 1304| 1227| 37| 1518| 1422| 56|EV | 4640|N19966 |EWR |DAY | 107| 533| 12| 27|2013-01-01 17:00:00 | | 2013| 1| 1| 1337| 1220| 77| 1649| 1531| 78|B6 | 673|N636JB |JFK |LAX | 352| 2475| 12| 20|2013-01-01 17:00:00 | | 2013| 1| 1| 1355| 1315| 40| 1538| 1452| 46|EV | 4552|N13958 |EWR |GSO | 86| 445| 13| 15|2013-01-01 18:00:00 | | 2013| 1| 1| 1356| 1259| 57| 1538| 1438| 60|UA | 32|N17128 |EWR |ORD | 135| 719| 12| 59|2013-01-01 17:00:00 |
::: 2. Retrieve the flight number, carrier name, and destination airport for all flights that departed from EWR (Newark Liberty International Airport). ::: {.cell} ```{.sql .cell-code} SELECT f.flight, a.name, f.dest FROM flights f JOIN airlines a ON f.carrier = a.carrier WHERE origin = 'EWR'; ```
Table: Displaying records 1 - 10 | flight|name |dest | |------:|:----------------------|:----| | 1545|United Air Lines Inc. |IAH | | 1696|United Air Lines Inc. |ORD | | 507|JetBlue Airways |FLL | | 1124|United Air Lines Inc. |SFO | | 1187|United Air Lines Inc. |LAS | | 343|JetBlue Airways |PBI | | 1895|American Airlines Inc. |MIA | | 1077|United Air Lines Inc. |MIA | | 575|Delta Air Lines Inc. |ATL | | 245|US Airways Inc. |PHX |
::: 3. Find the average arrival delay for each carrier. ::: {.cell} ```{.sql .cell-code} SELECT carrier, AVG(arr_delay) AS avg_arr_delay FROM flights GROUP BY carrier; ```
Table: Displaying records 1 - 10 |carrier | avg_arr_delay| |:-------|-------------:| |9E | 7.379669| |AA | 0.204878| |AS | -9.930889| |B6 | 9.603291| |DL | 1.887704| |EV | 15.796431| |F9 | 21.755520| |FL | 19.521202| |HA | -6.915205| |MQ | 7.900958|
::: 4. List the tail number, manufacturer, and model of planes that have flights departing from LGA (LaGuardia Airport). ::: {.cell} ```{.sql .cell-code} SELECT DISTINCT p.tailnum, p.manufacturer, p.model FROM flights f JOIN planes p ON f.tailnum = p.tailnum WHERE f.origin = 'LGA'; ```
Table: Displaying records 1 - 10 |tailnum |manufacturer |model | |:-------|:-----------------|:-----------| |N502MJ |BOMBARDIER INC |CL-600-2C10 | |N14923 |EMBRAER |EMB-145LR | |N627JB |AIRBUS |A320-232 | |N953DN |MCDONNELL DOUGLAS |MD-90-30 | |N8665A |BOMBARDIER INC |CL-600-2B19 | |N8587E |BOMBARDIER INC |CL-600-2B19 | |N12218 |BOEING |737-824 | |N557NW |BOEING |757-251 | |N825AS |CANADAIR |CL-600-2B19 | |N389DA |BOEING |737-832 |
::: 5. Retrieve the flight number, origin, destination, and the name of the destination airport for flights that traveled more than 1000 miles. ::: {.cell} ```{.sql .cell-code} SELECT f.flight, f.origin, f.dest, a.name AS destination_airport_name FROM flights f JOIN airports a ON f.dest = a.faa WHERE f.distance > 1000; ```
Table: Displaying records 1 - 10 | flight|origin |dest |destination_airport_name | |------:|:------|:----|:------------------------------| | 1545|EWR |IAH |George Bush Intercontinental | | 1714|LGA |IAH |George Bush Intercontinental | | 1141|JFK |MIA |Miami Intl | | 507|EWR |FLL |Fort Lauderdale Hollywood Intl | | 49|JFK |PBI |Palm Beach Intl | | 71|JFK |TPA |Tampa Intl | | 194|JFK |LAX |Los Angeles Intl | | 1124|EWR |SFO |San Francisco Intl | | 1187|EWR |LAS |Mc Carran Intl | | 371|LGA |FLL |Fort Lauderdale Hollywood Intl |
::: 6. Find all planes that are in the planes table but did not have any recorded flights in the flights table. ::: {.cell} ```{.sql .cell-code} SELECT p.tailnum, p.manufacturer, p.model FROM planes p LEFT JOIN flights f ON p.tailnum = f.tailnum WHERE f.tailnum IS NULL; ```
Table: 0 records |tailnum |manufacturer |model | |:-------|:------------|:-----|
::: 7. For each day, count the number of flights that were scheduled to depart. ::: {.cell} ```{.sql .cell-code} SELECT DATE_TRUNC('day', time_hour) AS day, COUNT(*) AS num_flights FROM flights GROUP BY DATE_TRUNC('day', time_hour) ORDER BY day; ```
Table: Displaying records 1 - 10 |day | num_flights| |:----------|-----------:| |2013-01-01 | 566| |2013-01-02 | 764| |2013-01-03 | 750| |2013-01-04 | 743| |2013-01-05 | 624| |2013-01-06 | 638| |2013-01-07 | 760| |2013-01-08 | 746| |2013-01-09 | 737| |2013-01-10 | 765|
::: 8. List the flights along with their corresponding weather conditions at the origin airport for January 1, 2013. ::: {.cell} ```{.sql .cell-code} SELECT f.flight, f.origin, w.temp, w.precip, w.wind_speed FROM flights f JOIN weather w ON f.origin = w.origin AND f.year = w.year AND f.month = w.month AND f.day = w.day AND f.hour = w.hour WHERE f.year = 2013 AND f.month = 1 AND f.day = 1; ```
Table: Displaying records 1 - 10 | flight|origin | temp| precip| wind_speed| |------:|:------|-----:|------:|----------:| | 1696|EWR | 39.02| 0| 12.65858| | 1545|EWR | 39.02| 0| 12.65858| | 1806|JFK | 39.02| 0| 14.96014| | 1141|JFK | 39.02| 0| 14.96014| | 1714|LGA | 39.92| 0| 14.96014| | 1701|EWR | 37.94| 0| 11.50780| | 507|EWR | 37.94| 0| 11.50780| | 1496|EWR | 37.94| 0| 11.50780| | 1111|EWR | 37.94| 0| 11.50780| | 1187|EWR | 37.94| 0| 11.50780|
::: 9. Find the carriers that have an average departure delay of more than 10 minutes. Find the carriers that have an average departure delay of more than 10 minutes. ::: {.cell} ```{.sql .cell-code} SELECT carrier, AVG(dep_delay) AS avg_dep_delay FROM flights GROUP BY carrier HAVING AVG(dep_delay) > 10; ```
Table: Displaying records 1 - 10 |carrier | avg_dep_delay| |:-------|-------------:| |9E | 16.72577| |B6 | 13.18561| |EV | 19.95539| |F9 | 20.08976| |FL | 18.28609| |OO | 12.58621| |UA | 12.11433| |VX | 12.86942| |WN | 17.71983| |YV | 18.99633|
::: 10. Retrieve the flight number, departure time, scheduled departure time, and manufacturer of planes that departed with a delay of more than 60 minutes. ::: {.cell} ```{.sql .cell-code} SELECT f.flight, f.dep_time, f.sched_dep_time, p.manufacturer FROM flights f JOIN planes p ON f.tailnum = p.tailnum WHERE f.dep_delay > 60; ```
Table: Displaying records 1 - 10 | flight| dep_time| sched_dep_time|manufacturer | |------:|--------:|--------------:|:----------------| | 856| 957| 733|BOEING | | 1086| 1114| 900|BOEING | | 4495| 1120| 944|EMBRAER | | 673| 1337| 1220|AIRBUS | | 4869| 1400| 1250|BOMBARDIER INC | | 4497| 1505| 1310|EMBRAER | | 525| 1525| 1340|EMBRAER | | 4181| 1549| 1445|EMBRAER | | 5712| 1558| 1359|CANADAIR | | 465| 1607| 1443|AIRBUS INDUSTRIE |
::: 11. List all flights that departed after the average departure time on January 1, 2013. ::: {.cell} ```{.sql .cell-code} SELECT * FROM flights WHERE dep_time > ( SELECT AVG(dep_time) FROM flights WHERE year = 2013 AND month = 1 AND day = 1 ) AND year = 2013 AND month = 1 AND day = 1; ```
Table: Displaying records 1 - 10 | year| month| day| dep_time| sched_dep_time| dep_delay| arr_time| sched_arr_time| arr_delay|carrier | flight|tailnum |origin |dest | air_time| distance| hour| minute|time_hour | |----:|-----:|---:|--------:|--------------:|---------:|--------:|--------------:|---------:|:-------|------:|:-------|:------|:----|--------:|--------:|----:|------:|:-------------------| | 2013| 1| 1| 1400| 1250| 70| 1645| 1502| 103|EV | 4869|N748EV |LGA |MEM | 178| 963| 12| 50|2013-01-01 17:00:00 | | 2013| 1| 1| 1400| 1400| 0| 1634| 1636| -2|DL | 2247|N6704Z |LGA |ATL | 130| 762| 14| 0|2013-01-01 19:00:00 | | 2013| 1| 1| 1402| 1323| 39| 1650| 1526| 84|EV | 4516|N13123 |EWR |MEM | 183| 946| 13| 23|2013-01-01 18:00:00 | | 2013| 1| 1| 1408| 1411| -3| 1646| 1640| 6|FL | 349|N895AT |LGA |ATL | 133| 762| 14| 11|2013-01-01 19:00:00 | | 2013| 1| 1| 1411| 1315| 56| 1717| 1611| 66|B6 | 505|N516JB |EWR |FLL | 154| 1065| 13| 15|2013-01-01 18:00:00 | | 2013| 1| 1| 1416| 1411| 5| 1603| 1549| 14|UA | 683|N456UA |EWR |ORD | 136| 719| 14| 11|2013-01-01 19:00:00 | | 2013| 1| 1| 1418| 1419| -1| 1726| 1732| -6|UA | 16|N37464 |EWR |SEA | 348| 2402| 14| 19|2013-01-01 19:00:00 | | 2013| 1| 1| 1421| 1422| -1| 1517| 1535| -18|B6 | 1010|N274JB |JFK |BOS | 38| 187| 14| 22|2013-01-01 19:00:00 | | 2013| 1| 1| 1421| 1355| 26| 1735| 1709| 26|B6 | 83|N503JB |JFK |SEA | 349| 2422| 13| 55|2013-01-01 18:00:00 | | 2013| 1| 1| 1421| 1430| -9| 1724| 1752| -28|DL | 1531|N327NW |LGA |RSW | 160| 1080| 14| 30|2013-01-01 19:00:00 |
::: 12. Retrieve the names of carriers that had flights departing from EWR with a delay greater than the average departure delay of all flights from EWR. ::: {.cell} ```{.sql .cell-code} WITH avg_dep_delay_ewr AS ( SELECT AVG(dep_delay) AS avg_dep_delay FROM flights WHERE origin = 'EWR' ) SELECT DISTINCT a.name AS carrier_name FROM flights f JOIN avg_dep_delay_ewr avg ON f.dep_delay > avg.avg_dep_delay JOIN airlines a ON f.carrier = a.carrier WHERE f.origin = 'EWR'; ```
Table: Displaying records 1 - 10 |carrier_name | |:------------------------| |Alaska Airlines Inc. | |Southwest Airlines Co. | |JetBlue Airways | |Virgin America | |Envoy Air | |American Airlines Inc. | |Delta Air Lines Inc. | |ExpressJet Airlines Inc. | |SkyWest Airlines Inc. | |US Airways Inc. |
::: 13. List the flight number, origin, and the maximum departure delay for flights on the same day. ::: {.cell} ```{.sql .cell-code} SELECT flight, origin, MAX(dep_delay) AS max_dep_delay FROM flights GROUP BY year, month, day, flight, origin; ```
Table: Displaying records 1 - 10 | flight|origin | max_dep_delay| |------:|:------|-------------:| | 4255|EWR | -2| | 3302|EWR | -7| | 125|JFK | 28| | 1245|EWR | -4| | 2147|LGA | -6| | 1231|LGA | 11| | 505|EWR | 57| | 2054|LGA | -2| | 1698|EWR | 31| | 4517|LGA | 28|
::: 14. Find all flights that had a departure delay greater than the average departure delay of their respective carrier. ::: {.cell} ```{.sql .cell-code} WITH avg_dep_delay_per_carrier AS ( SELECT carrier, AVG(dep_delay) AS avg_dep_delay FROM flights GROUP BY carrier ) SELECT f.* FROM flights f JOIN avg_dep_delay_per_carrier ad ON f.carrier = ad.carrier WHERE f.dep_delay > ad.avg_dep_delay; ```
Table: Displaying records 1 - 10 | year| month| day| dep_time| sched_dep_time| dep_delay| arr_time| sched_arr_time| arr_delay|carrier | flight|tailnum |origin |dest | air_time| distance| hour| minute|time_hour | |----:|-----:|---:|--------:|--------------:|---------:|--------:|--------------:|---------:|:-------|------:|:-------|:------|:----|--------:|--------:|----:|------:|:-------------------| | 2013| 1| 1| 632| 608| 24| 740| 728| 12|EV | 4144|N13553 |EWR |IAD | 52| 212| 6| 8|2013-01-01 11:00:00 | | 2013| 1| 1| 732| 645| 47| 1011| 941| 30|UA | 1111|N37456 |EWR |MCO | 145| 937| 6| 45|2013-01-01 11:00:00 | | 2013| 1| 1| 743| 730| 13| 1107| 1100| 7|AA | 33|N338AA |JFK |LAX | 358| 2475| 7| 30|2013-01-01 12:00:00 | | 2013| 1| 1| 743| 730| 13| 1059| 1056| 3|DL | 495|N3760C |JFK |SEA | 349| 2422| 7| 30|2013-01-01 12:00:00 | | 2013| 1| 1| 906| 843| 23| 1134| 1125| 9|UA | 1643|N17139 |EWR |DEN | 246| 1605| 8| 43|2013-01-01 13:00:00 | | 2013| 1| 1| 914| 900| 14| 1058| 1043| 15|UA | 783|N810UA |EWR |CLE | 85| 404| 9| 0|2013-01-01 14:00:00 | | 2013| 1| 1| 920| 905| 15| 1039| 1025| 14|B6 | 1305|N346JB |JFK |IAD | 52| 228| 9| 5|2013-01-01 14:00:00 | | 2013| 1| 1| 921| 900| 21| 1237| 1227| 10|DL | 120|N713TW |JFK |LAX | 333| 2475| 9| 0|2013-01-01 14:00:00 | | 2013| 1| 1| 930| 905| 25| 1218| 1209| 9|UA | 1148|N57439 |EWR |TPA | 149| 997| 9| 5|2013-01-01 14:00:00 | | 2013| 1| 1| 933| 904| 29| 1252| 1210| 42|B6 | 17|N579JB |JFK |FLL | 170| 1069| 9| 4|2013-01-01 14:00:00 |
::: 15. For each carrier, find the average arrival delay and list carriers that have an average arrival delay of more than 10 minutes. ::: {.cell} ```{.sql .cell-code} SELECT carrier, avg_arr_delay FROM ( SELECT carrier, AVG(arr_delay) AS avg_arr_delay FROM flights GROUP BY carrier ) AS avg_delays WHERE avg_arr_delay > 10; ```
Table: 5 records |carrier | avg_arr_delay| |:-------|-------------:| |EV | 15.79643| |F9 | 21.75552| |FL | 19.52120| |OO | 11.93103| |YV | 15.55699|
::: 16. List the tail numbers of planes that have flown more than the average distance of all flights. ::: {.cell} ```{.sql .cell-code} SELECT DISTINCT tailnum FROM flights WHERE distance > ( SELECT AVG(distance) FROM flights ); ```
Table: Displaying records 1 - 10 |tailnum | |:-------| |N912XJ | |N454UA | |N645JB | |N280WN | |N904WN | |N14972 | |N67052 | |N667UA | |N521JB | |N563AS |
::: 17. Find all flights that have corresponding weather data with a temperature higher than 80Â°F at the origin airport. ::: {.cell} ```{.sql .cell-code} SELECT * FROM flights f WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM weather w WHERE f.origin = w.origin AND f.year = w.year AND f.month = w.month AND f.day = w.day AND w.temp > 80 ); ```
Table: Displaying records 1 - 10 | year| month| day| dep_time| sched_dep_time| dep_delay| arr_time| sched_arr_time| arr_delay|carrier | flight|tailnum |origin |dest | air_time| distance| hour| minute|time_hour | |----:|-----:|---:|--------:|--------------:|---------:|--------:|--------------:|---------:|:-------|------:|:-------|:------|:----|--------:|--------:|----:|------:|:-------------------| | 2013| 10| 1| 447| 500| -13| 614| 648| -34|US | 1877|N538UW |EWR |CLT | 69| 529| 5| 0|2013-10-01 09:00:00 | | 2013| 10| 1| 522| 517| 5| 735| 757| -22|UA | 252|N556UA |EWR |IAH | 174| 1400| 5| 17|2013-10-01 09:00:00 | | 2013| 10| 1| 536| 545| -9| 809| 855| -46|AA | 2243|N630AA |JFK |MIA | 132| 1089| 5| 45|2013-10-01 09:00:00 | | 2013| 10| 1| 539| 545| -6| 801| 827| -26|UA | 1714|N37252 |LGA |IAH | 172| 1416| 5| 45|2013-10-01 09:00:00 | | 2013| 10| 1| 549| 600| -11| 653| 716| -23|EV | 5716|N830AS |JFK |IAD | 46| 228| 6| 0|2013-10-01 10:00:00 | | 2013| 10| 1| 550| 600| -10| 648| 700| -12|US | 1909|N949UW |LGA |PHL | 38| 96| 6| 0|2013-10-01 10:00:00 | | 2013| 10| 1| 550| 600| -10| 649| 659| -10|US | 2167|N749US |LGA |DCA | 39| 214| 6| 0|2013-10-01 10:00:00 | | 2013| 10| 1| 551| 600| -9| 727| 730| -3|UA | 279|N415UA |EWR |ORD | 117| 719| 6| 0|2013-10-01 10:00:00 | | 2013| 10| 1| 551| 600| -9| 710| 721| -11|UA | 1029|N27722 |LGA |ORD | 114| 733| 6| 0|2013-10-01 10:00:00 | | 2013| 10| 1| 551| 600| -9| 655| 708| -13|B6 | 2180|N238JB |EWR |BOS | 40| 200| 6| 0|2013-10-01 10:00:00 |
::: 18. List carriers that have more than 100 flights with departure delays. ::: {.cell} ```{.sql .cell-code} SELECT carrier, COUNT(*) AS num_flights FROM flights GROUP BY carrier HAVING COUNT(*) > 100 AND COUNT(dep_delay) > ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM flights WHERE dep_delay IS NOT NULL ); ```
Table: 0 records |carrier | num_flights| |:-------|-----------:|
::: 19. Find all planes that have not flown to JFK (John F. Kennedy International Airport). ::: {.cell} ```{.sql .cell-code} SELECT tailnum FROM planes WHERE tailnum NOT IN ( SELECT DISTINCT tailnum FROM flights WHERE dest = 'JFK' ); ```
Table: Displaying records 1 - 10 |tailnum | |:-------| |N10156 | |N102UW | |N103US | |N104UW | |N10575 | |N105UW | |N107US | |N108UW | |N109UW | |N110UW |
::: 20. List each flight along with the average departure delay for flights from the same origin on the same day. ::: {.cell} ```{.sql .cell-code} SELECT flight, origin, year, month, day, AVG(dep_delay) AS avg_dep_delay FROM flights GROUP BY origin, year, month, day, flight; ```
Table: Displaying records 1 - 10 | flight|origin | year| month| day| avg_dep_delay| |------:|:------|----:|-----:|---:|-------------:| | 746|EWR | 2013| 10| 9| -5| | 127|EWR | 2013| 10| 1| 3| | 446|EWR | 2013| 10| 11| 45| | 4185|EWR | 2013| 1| 9| -8| | 4364|EWR | 2013| 1| 15| -4| | 4502|EWR | 2013| 10| 23| -6| | 2379|LGA | 2013| 1| 12| -8| | 1483|EWR | 2013| 10| 18| -3| | 563|LGA | 2013| 10| 3| -6| | 1715|LGA | 2013| 1| 15| -1|
:::
